text: The Men's 64 kg event at the 2010 South American Games had its quarterfinals held on March 23, the semifinals on March 25 and the final on March 27. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Myke Carvalho |Miguel Escandon |Gustiniano Mina Caicedo Angelo Baez Aros |} ==Results== ==References== *Report 64kg M
title: Boxing at the 2010 South American Games – Men's 64kg
